structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Effect of irregularity -- Exclusive remedies -- Effect of release.
law.text: The collection of an assessment shall not be defeated, where the parties are properly before the court, on account of any irregularity in the proceedings that does not affect the substantial right of the party complaining. The remedies provided for in this chapter are exclusive of all other remedies. If any person or property is released, or any assessment raised or lowered, it shall not affect the rights or liabilities of any other property or person.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938g-20.
